issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
With the current production release of Titanium Studio (build 1.0.4.201108101535), project creation fails for a project trying to use the mobile web preview linked to from here:

http://support.appcelerator.com/kb/81/tickets

This prevents customers from previewing the mobile web SDK.  To duplicate, try installing the mobile web SDK and generate a new project from within Studio using this SDK version.
fields.summary: Unable to generate HTML 5 project with current Studio and "1.7.0RC1"

comments.body: Need to update KB article, not directly a problem with the SDK - at least not one we need to code around.
Closing ticket as the issue will not fix.
